content:
Welcome to XuHao’s Blog👋 你好! 我是XuHao, 一个80后工程师, 居住在成都, 对机器学习、数据科学和编程感兴趣. 我喜欢从日常生活中寻找灵感, 将随笔记录在这里, 欢迎交流指正！😉
Hey there! This is XuHao, an engineer born in the late ’80s. I’m living in Chengdu and have a keen interest in machine learning, data science and programming. I especially love drawing inspiration from everyday life and jot down my insights right here, feel free to drop by, chat, and even correct me if you see fit!😉
